description: Try our easy to follow Nudie Apple Bircher Muesli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Nudie Apple Bircher Muesli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Nudie nothing but cloudy apple juice
2 medium sized apples, grated with skin on
0.5 cup plain unsweetened natural yogurt (for diary free use almond milk)
2 tbs LSA cereal (ground linseed, sunflower & almond meal)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak oats, LSA, sunflower and pumpkin seeds in lemon juice, nudie nothing but apple juice, water and yoghurt for at least 8 hours (or you can leave in the fridge overnight).
Add grated apple and natural yogurt. Top with cinnamon, chia seeds, almonds, brazils or walnuts.
